text: I've lived in Brooklyn most of my life
I've never seen the subway system shut

that is quite a shock but I think they
didn't know what the storm was doing so
I guess it was better to be safe than
sorry
I was a bit irritated I think that
things got overblown and I think the
politicians started one-upping each
other to see them most concerned and
present the diarist case possible but

today and so I can't begrudge it
entirely normally at around this time
I'd be getting on the subway getting on
the probably the queue line over there
we need to take these things seriously
and the worst thing is to not be
prepared so I understand why there was a
lot of attention Toronto and so on I
didn't really think was going to be that
bad I was hoping there be enough snow to

seems to have happened all right you
